titleStmt.title: A speech spoken by Sr. Thomas Wroth knight, in the honourable House of Commons: vpon his delivery of a petition from the knights, gentlemen, and freeholders of the county of Somerset. February 25. 1642. Together with the petition of the said county then delivered.
titleStmt.author: Wroth, Thomas, Sir, 1584-1672.

notesStmt.note: Thomason E.200[34] has the caption title: "To the honourable the knights, citizens and burgesses of the House of Commons, now assembled in Parliament.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
